DataElement.preferredName: EQ-5D-3L Questionnaire v1.0 3 Usual Activities Today Status 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of their health state today as related to their usual activities (work, study, housework, family, or leisure activities), using a 3 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Three Level Questionnaire Usual Activities Today Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 3 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient._A question about an individual's current ability to do their usual activities._A condition or state at a particular time.

Each dimension has 3 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.

Concepts.longName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Three Level Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 3 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A three point ordered reference standard that describes current health state related to usual activity using the EQ-5D-3L questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.value: I am unable to perform my usual activities

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to perform their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to perform their usual activities.

PermissibleValues.value: I have no problems with performing my usual activities

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no problems with performing their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no problems with performing their usual activities.

PermissibleValues.value: I have some problems with performing my usual activities

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had some problems with performing their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had some problems with performing their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Usual Activities (e.g. work,

ReferenceDocuments.name: EQ-5D-3L
ReferenceDocuments.description: Usual Activities (e.g. work, study, housework, family or leisure activities) (3)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. Where an investigator wants to use single Patient Reported Outcome items that are integrated into a study, DCP review is required prior to inclusion of the item on a case report form.
